original_text: But I do know that much trouble will come to me. The Holy Spirit has told me about that. He said to me, “People will put you in prison and they will hurt you.”
korean_text: 오직 성령이 각 성에서 내게 증언하여 결박과 환난이 나를 기다린다 하시나

sentences.original_text: that much trouble will come to me
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 환난이 내게 닥칠 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: The Holy Spirit has told me about that
People will put you in prison
